forge.llmEndpoint.description: Base URL for the local LLM server (OpenAI-compatible).

forge.llmModel.description: Model name to send in chat completion requests.

forge.llmApiKey.description: Optional API key for the local LLM server.

forge.skipTargetConfirmation.description: Skip the confirmation prompt before editing the active file.

forge.skipConfirmations.description: Automatically accept confirmation prompts (apply changes, git workflow, commit, push).

forge.showDiffPreview.description: Show a diff preview tab before applying changes.

forge.autoValidation.description: Automatically select and run the best validation command (test > typecheck > lint > build).

forge.enableMultiFile.description: Allow the LLM to edit multiple files in one run.

forge.autoFixValidation.description: Attempt to auto-fix validation failures using the LLM.

forge.autoFixMaxRetries.description: Maximum number of auto-fix attempts after validation fails.

forge.llmTimeoutMs.description: Timeout in milliseconds for LLM requests.

forge.verboseLogs.description: Show verbose diagnostic logs in the Forge output panel.

forge.keepAliveSeconds.description: Ping the LLM every N seconds to keep it warm (0 disables).

forge.enableGitWorkflow.description: Enable the Git workflow (status, commit, push) after changes.

forge.gitStageMode.description: Choose whether to stage all files or select files for commit.

forge.gitAutoMessage.description: Generate a commit message suggestion using the LLM.

forge.gitAutoPush.description: If skipConfirmations is true, allow automatic push.

forge.projectSummaryMaxChars.description: Maximum characters to include when summarizing the project.

forge.projectSummaryMaxFiles.description: Maximum number of files to include when summarizing the project.

forge.projectSummaryMaxFileBytes.description: Maximum size in bytes for any single file included in the project summary.

forge.projectSummaryChunkChars.description: Maximum characters per chunk when summarizing large projects.

forge.projectSummaryMaxChunks.description: Maximum number of chunks to summarize when describing the project.

forge.skipCreateFilePicker.description: Skip the file picker when the prompt is about creating new files (use automatic selection).

forge.chatHistoryMaxMessages.description: Maximum number of recent chat messages to include as context.

forge.chatHistoryMaxChars.description: Maximum total characters of chat history to include as context.

forge.intentUseLLM.description: Use the LLM to classify prompt intent (edit/question/fix).

forge.clarifyBeforeEdit.description: Ask clarifying questions before editing when the prompt is ambiguous.

forge.clarifyOnlyIf.description: When to block for clarification: always, or only if the prompt is very unclear.

forge.clarifyAutoAssume.description: If clarification is required, proceed by applying safe default assumptions instead of stopping.
